page.title: 05Why We Live in this Area.
page.content: Most people live here because their work is connected with the land or because they work in the neighbouring towns of Alnwick or Wooler. Mark's parents however{have moved here {recently especially to bring up their {two children in the country away from {the bustle of town life.}Father is an accountant and Mother a director of a coal business but they prefer to travel forty miles to work than live in an industrial town. We interviewed Miss Guthrie who is eighty-six years old and was once this school's cook. She has always lived in this area and has never wanted to live anywhere else. She explained that{it {was difficult to move away}anyway when she was a child as there were hardly any motor cars, horses and carts were very slow and girls could only go to relations. She's not regretted staying
